bibl.title: Photograph of the Memorial to Carlos J. Finlay near Almendares Bridge, Quemados, Cuba, [1950]

div1.head: Photograph of the Memorial to Carlos J. Finlay near Almendares Bridge, Quemados, Cuba, [1950]
div1.p:
Columbia Ave
to Quemados
Havana
Almendores
river &
bridge
New (1950?)
Finlay memorial
Recent memorial to finlay, put up
by Lions Club about 1950. It is
on the far (south west) side of the
Almendares 2d bridge from Havana
along Columbia Ave to Almendares
suburb (enroute to Quemados)
Dr Nogueira that he had persuaded them to put
it at Camp Lazear but they decided nobody
would see it there so they put it here!!
DR. PHILIP S. HENCH
MAYO CLINIC
ROCHESTER, MINN.
295H
